name: Winter Weather
description:
Created for Terry Cavanagh's STOP WAITING FOR GODOT jam: https://itch.io/jam/stop-waiting-for-godot

Controls

Controls aren't yet customizable. You have the choice between keyboard or an Xbox 360 controller.

Keyboard

WASD to move, mouse to look around, left click or E to pickup. ESC to restart.

Controller

Left stick to move, right stick to look around, A to pickup, B to leave. START to restart.

Goal

Explore, relax, and find all the notes 👀

Nathan and everyone at GDQuest for pushing me to learn so much more about this engine in the past few months.
